name: Evocation
description: You can cast evocation magic, calling forth fire, force, air, earth, water, or spirit.

name: Thaumaturgy
description: You can perform thaumaturgy, the subtle art of ritual magic.

name: The Sight
description: You can open your Third Eye to see the true nature of things.

name: Soulgaze
description: When you look into someone's eyes, you see into their soul, and they into yours.

name: Wizard's Constitution
description: You heal faster than normal mortals and can recover from injuries that would kill others.

name: Refinement
description: Your magical abilities are more refined, granting additional specialization bonuses.

name: Channeling
description: You can channel a specific element or type of power for evocation effects.

name: Ritual
description: You can perform one specific type of thaumaturgy.

name: Inhuman Strength
description: You possess strength beyond mortal limits.

name: Inhuman Speed
description: You can move faster than humanly possible.

name: Inhuman Toughness
description: You can withstand punishment that would kill a mortal.

name: Inhuman Recovery
description: You heal from injuries at an accelerated rate.

name: Claws
description: You have natural weapons that can tear through flesh.

name: Wings
description: You have functional wings that allow you to fly.

name: Aquatic
description: You can breathe underwater and move freely in aquatic environments.

name: True Faith
description: Your faith provides protection against supernatural evil.

name: Bless This House
description: You can create threshold-like protections through faith.

name: Guide My Hand
description: In times of need, your faith guides your actions.

name: Righteousness
description: Your faith empowers you to stand against evil.

name: Holy Touch
description: Your touch can harm creatures of darkness.
